mapper.sql: ID, SUBJECT_TYPE, ONLINE_TITLE, ONLINE_DETAIL, OP_ID, ONLINE_STATE, ONLINE_TIME, PRODUCT_ID, SUPPLIER_ID, SUPPLIER_SETTLE_TYPE
mapper.insert: insert into ONL_ONLINE (ID, SUBJECT_TYPE, ONLINE_TITLE, ONLINE_DETAIL, OP_ID, ONLINE_STATE, ONLINE_TIME, PRODUCT_ID, SUPPLIER_ID, SUPPLIER_SETTLE_TYPE) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{subjectType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{onlineTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onlineDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{onlineState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{supplierSettleType,jdbcType=TINYINT})

insert into ONL_ONLINE
ID,
SUBJECT_TYPE,
ONLINE_TITLE,
ONLINE_DETAIL,
OP_ID,
ONLINE_STATE,
ONLINE_TIME,
PRODUCT_ID,
SUPPLIER_ID,
SUPPLIER_SETTLE_TYPE,

#{subjectType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{onlineTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{onlineDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{opId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{onlineState,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

mapper.update:
update ONL_ONLINE
SUBJECT_TYPE = #{subjectType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ONLINE_TITLE = #{onlineTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ONLINE_DETAIL = #{onlineDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OP_ID = #{opId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ONLINE_STATE = #{onlineState,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ONLINE_TIME = #{onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SUPPLIER_SETTLE_TYPE = #{supplierSettleType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ONL_ONLINE set SUBJECT_TYPE = #{subjectType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ONLINE_TITLE = #{onlineTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ONLINE_DETAIL = #{onlineDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OP_ID = #{opId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ONLINE_STATE = #{onlineState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ONLINE_TIME = #{onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SUPPLIER_SETTLE_TYPE = #{supplierSettleType,jdbcType=TINYINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, SUBJECT_TYPE, ONLINE_TITLE, ONLINE_DETAIL, OP_ID, ONLINE_STATE, ONLINE_TIME, PRODUCT_ID, SUPPLIER_ID, SUPPLIER_SETTLE_TYPE from ONL_ONLINE

SELECT oo.ID, oo.ONLINE_TITLE, oo.SUBJECT_TYPE,oopc.PIC_PATH, oos.ONLINE_SPEC, oos.SALE_PRICE, oos.CASHBACK_AMOUNT, oos.ID AS SPEC_ID, oo.ONLINE_DETAIL FROM ONL_ONLINE oo LEFT JOIN ONL_ONLINE_SPEC oos ON oos.ONLINE_ID = oo.ID LEFT JOIN ONL_ONLINE_PIC oopc ON oo.ID=oopc.ONLINE_ID WHERE oos.ID = ( SELECT ID FROM ONL_ONLINE_SPEC WHERE ONLINE_ID=oo.ID and CURRENT_ONLINE_COUNT - SALE_COUNT > 0 and SALE_PRICE=( SELECT min(oos.SALE_PRICE) FROM ONL_ONLINE_SPEC oos WHERE oos.ONLINE_ID = oo.ID and oos.CURRENT_ONLINE_COUNT - oos.SALE_COUNT > 0 ) limit 1 ) AND oo.ONLINE_STATE=1 AND oopc.PIC_TYPE=1
AND oo.ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
AND oo.ONLINE_TITLE LIKE '%${onlineTitle}%'
AND oo.SUBJECT_TYPE = '${subjectType}'
AND oos.SALE_PRICE > '${lowPrice}'
AND oos.SALE_PRICE < '${hignPrice}'
order by ${sortname} ${sortOrder} LIMIT ${start}, ${size}

SELECT oo.ID, oo.ONLINE_TITLE, oopc.PIC_PATH, oos.ONLINE_SPEC, oos.SALE_PRICE, oos.CASHBACK_AMOUNT, oos.ID AS SPEC_ID, oo.ONLINE_DETAIL FROM ONL_ONLINE oo LEFT JOIN ONL_ONLINE_SPEC oos ON oos.ID = ( SELECT MIN(ID) FROM ONL_ONLINE_SPEC WHERE SALE_PRICE=(SELECT min(SALE_PRICE) FROM ONL_ONLINE_SPEC WHERE ONLINE_ID=oo.ID and CURRENT_ONLINE_COUNT - SALE_COUNT > 0) AND SEQ_NO=(SELECT MIN(oos.SEQ_NO) FROM ONL_ONLINE_SPEC oos WHERE oos.ONLINE_ID = oo.ID and oos.CURRENT_ONLINE_COUNT - oos.SALE_COUNT > 0) ) LEFT JOIN ONL_ONLINE_PIC oopc ON oo.ID=oopc.ONLINE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND oo.ID IN ( SELECT ONLINE_ID FROM ONL_ONLINE_SPEC WHERE ONLINE_ID=oo.ID and SALE_PRICE=(SELECT min(SALE_PRICE) FROM ONL_ONLINE_SPEC WHERE ONLINE_ID = oo.ID and CURRENT_ONLINE_COUNT - SALE_COUNT > 0) AND SEQ_NO=(SELECT MIN(oos.SEQ_NO) FROM ONL_ONLINE_SPEC oos WHERE oos.ONLINE_ID = oo.ID and oos.CURRENT_ONLINE_COUNT - oos.SALE_COUNT > 0) ) AND oo.ONLINE_STATE=1 AND oopc.PIC_TYPE=1 AND oo.ID=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ONL_ONLINE WHERE PRODUCE_ID=#{produceId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND ONLINE_STATE=1
